item.description: Rome wasn’t built in a day. How does Redis architecture evolve? Redis is a popular in-memory cache. How did it evolve to the architecture it is today? ðŸ”¹ 2010 - Standalone Redis When Redis 1.0 was released in 2010, the architecture was quite simple. It is usually used as a cache to the business application. However, Redis stores data in memory. When we restart Redis, we will lose all the data and the traffic directly hits the database.
